data.name: Ancestors Legacy - Digital Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Ancestors Legacy Original Game Soundtrack

Author: Adam Skorupa and Krzysztof Wierzynkiewicz

Available formats: 320kbps MP3, 1411kbps WAV

Track list:


01. Hear Our Call (Main Theme)
02. Round-Shielded Invaders
03. Calm Before The Storm
04. Gravedancers of Odin
05. Forgotten Nights
06. Hordes of The North
07. Fallen Bretheren
08. Death is Nigh
09. Cold Plains of Britannia
10. Fists and Steel
11. These Marshes Shall Be Your Grave
12. Morbid Admonition
13. Crown of The Damned
14. Gallows For The Traitors
15. Dreams of Peace
16. The Burden of Nobility
17. Spirits of the Forefathers
18. The Wrath of Perun
19. Howlings of the Dark Past
20. Wild Spirits
21. My Strength Lies in Veles
22. Uncertain Future
23. To See Beyond the Flesh
24. Vengeance of the Easterners
25. Times of Conquest
26. Dreams of Power
27. Defenders of The Holy Empire
28. Sworn to The Cross
29. Lust For Power
30. To Serve You Is To Reign
31. Will of Mein Kaiser
32. Nightly Prayer
33. To Sacrifice the Forsaken
34. Sacred Crusades
35. Reunion in Valhalla (Reveal Trailer Theme)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any Windows
  • Processor: Intel Atom
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics
  • Storage: 1400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card.
  • Additional Notes: MP3 and WAV files only.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any OS X
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 1400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card.
  • Additional Notes: MP3 and WAV files only.
